Financial Results (Q4 FY25):Havells India's consolidated net sales for Q4 FY25 increased by 20.24% year-on-year (YoY) to ₹6,543.56 crore. Standalone net sales also saw a similar increase of 20.2% YoY to ₹6,532.21 crore. The company's earnings call invite for Q4 FY25 was available around this period.

Share Price:The Havells India stock price experienced some fluctuations around May 1, 2025, including slight decreases,according to Angel One. The closing price on August 21, 2025, was ₹1,554.00, down -0.89% from the previous close.

Product Launch:Havells India's brand, Lloyd, launched its "Luxuria collection" including innovative StunnAir and expanded Stellar & Stylus models on April 7, 2025, responding to the demand for premium air conditioners. This expanded the combined manufacturing capacity of the Ghiloth and Sri City plants to 3 million ACs annually.
